verses.verse: לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician שִׁ֣יר <WH7892> A Song מִזְמ֑וֹר <WH4210> [or] Psalm הָרִ֥יעוּ <WH7321> Make a joyful noise לֵ֝אלֹהִים <WH430> unto God כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> all ye lands
זַמְּר֥וּ <WH2167> Sing forth כְבֽוֹד־ <WH3519> the honour שְׁמ֑וֹ <WH8034> of his name שִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> make כָ֝ב֗וֹד <WH3519> glorious תְּהִלָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH8416> his praise

אִמְר֣וּ <WH559> Say לֵ֭אלֹהִים <WH430> unto God מַה־ <WH4100> How נּוֹרָ֣א <WH3372> How terrible מַעֲשֶׂ֑יךָ <WH4639> [art thou in] thy works בְּרֹ֥ב <WH7230> through the greatness עֻ֝זְּךָ֗ <WH5797> of thy power יְֽכַחֲשׁ֖וּ <WH3584> submit לְךָ֣ אֹיְבֶֽיךָ׃ <WH341> shall thine enemies

כָּל־ <WH3605> All הָאָ֤רֶץ ׀ <WH776> All the earth יִשְׁתַּחֲו֣וּ <WH7812> shall worship לְ֭ךָ וִֽיזַמְּרוּ־ <WH2167> thee and shall sing לָ֑ךְ יְזַמְּר֖וּ <WH2167> unto thee they shall sing שִׁמְךָ֣ <WH8034> [to] thy name סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

לְכ֣וּ <WH1980> Come וּ֭רְאוּ <WH7200> and see מִפְעֲל֣וֹת <WH4659> the works אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God נוֹרָ֥א <WH3372> [he is] terrible עֲ֝לִילָ֗ה <WH5949> [in his] doing עַל־ <WH5921> toward בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> toward the children אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of men

הָ֤פַךְ <WH2015> He turned יָ֨ם ׀ <WH3220> the sea לְֽיַבָּשָׁ֗ה <WH3004> into dry בַּ֭נָּהָר <WH5104> through the flood יַֽעַבְר֣וּ <WH5674> [land] they went בְרָ֑גֶל <WH7272> on foot שָׁ֝֗ם <WH8033> There נִשְׂמְחָה־ <WH8055> there did we rejoice בּֽוֹ׃

מֹ֘שֵׁ֤ל <WH4910> He ruleth בִּגְבוּרָת֨וֹ ׀ <WH1369> by his power עוֹלָ֗ם <WH5769> for ever עֵ֭ינָיו <WH5869> his eyes בַּגּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> the nations תִּצְפֶּ֑ינָה <WH6822> behold הַסּוֹרְרִ֓ים ׀ <WH5637> let not the rebellious אַל־ <WH408> nay [יָרִימוּ כ] (יָר֖וּמוּ <WH7311> bring up ק) לָ֣מוֹ סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> themselves Selah
בָּרְכ֖וּ <WH1288> O bless עַמִּ֥ים ׀ <WH5971> ye people אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> our God וְ֝הַשְׁמִ֗יעוּ <WH8085> to be heard ק֣וֹל <WH6963> and make the voice תְּהִלָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH8416> of his praise

הַשָּׂ֣ם <WH7760> Which holdeth נַ֭פְשֵׁנוּ <WH5315> our soul בַּֽחַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> in life וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> and does not נָתַ֖ן <WH5414> and suffereth לַמּ֣וֹט <WH4132> to be moved רַגְלֵֽנוּ׃ <WH7272> not our feet
כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for בְחַנְתָּ֥נוּ <WH974> hast proved אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> For thou O God צְ֝רַפְתָּ֗נוּ <WH6884> us thou hast tried כִּצְרָף־ <WH6884> is tried כָּֽסֶף׃ <WH3701> us as silver
הֲבֵאתָ֥נוּ <WH935> Thou broughtest בַמְּצוּדָ֑ה <WH4686> us into the net שַׂ֖מְתָּ <WH7760> thou laidst מוּעָקָ֣ה <WH4157> affliction בְמָתְנֵֽינוּ׃ <WH4975> upon our loins

הִרְכַּ֥בְתָּ <WH7392> to ride אֱנ֗וֹשׁ <WH582> Thou hast caused men לְרֹ֫אשֵׁ֥נוּ <WH7218> over our heads בָּֽאנוּ־ <WH935> we went בָאֵ֥שׁ <WH784> through fire וּבַמַּ֑יִם <WH4325> and through water וַ֝תּוֹצִיאֵ֗נוּ <WH3318> but thou broughtest us out לָֽרְוָיָֽה׃ <WH7310> into a wealthy
אָב֣וֹא <WH935> I will go בֵיתְךָ֣ <WH1004> into thy house בְעוֹל֑וֹת <WH5930> with burnt offerings אֲשַׁלֵּ֖ם <WH7999> I will pay לְךָ֣ נְדָרָֽי׃ <WH5088> thee my vows
אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> Which פָּצ֥וּ <WH6475> have uttered שְׂפָתָ֑י <WH8193> Which my lips וְדִבֶּר־ <WH1696> hath spoken פִּ֝֗י <WH6310> and my mouth בַּצַּר־ <WH6862> when I was in trouble לִֽי׃

עֹ֘ל֤וֹת <WH5930> unto thee burnt sacrifices מֵחִ֣ים <WH4220> of fatlings אַעֲלֶה־ <WH5927> I will offer לָּ֭ךְ עִם־ <WH5973> With קְטֹ֣רֶת <WH7004> with the incense אֵילִ֑ים <WH352> of rams אֶ֥עֱשֶֽׂה <WH6213> I will offer בָקָ֖ר <WH1241> bullocks עִם־ <WH5973> with עַתּוּדִ֣ים <WH6260> with goats סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

לְכֽוּ־ <WH1980> Come שִׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> [and] hear וַ֭אֲסַפְּרָה <WH5608> and I will declare כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִרְאֵ֣י <WH3373> all ye that fear אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> God אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> of what עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> what he hath done לְנַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> for my soul
אֵלָ֥יו <WH413> to him פִּֽי־ <WH6310> unto him with my mouth קָרָ֑אתִי <WH7121> I cried וְ֝רוֹמַ֗ם <WH7318> be extolled תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> with לְשׁוֹנִֽי׃ <WH3956> my tongue
אָ֭וֶן <WH205> iniquity אִם־ <WH518> If רָאִ֣יתִי <WH7200> If I regard בְלִבִּ֑י <WH3820> in my heart לֹ֖א <WH3808> will not יִשְׁמַ֣ע ׀ <WH8085> will not hear אֲדֹנָֽי׃ <WH136> the Lord
אָ֭כֵן <WH403> [But] verily שָׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> hath heard אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> God הִ֝קְשִׁ֗יב <WH7181> [me] he hath attended בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> to the voice תְּפִלָּתִֽי׃ <WH8605> of my prayer

בָּר֥וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> [be] God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> Who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor הֵסִ֘יר <WH5493> which hath not turned away תְּפִלָּתִ֥י <WH8605> my prayer וְ֝חַסְדּ֗וֹ <WH2617> nor his mercy מֵאִתִּֽי׃ <WH854> chief
